title._content: Steam heat, Gare du Nord, Paris

description._content: Title: Steam heat, Gare du Nord, Paris Creator: Unknown Date: ca. 1925 Place: Paris, France Part Of: David Goodyear collection of foreign railroad photographs Description: This photograph shows a compound Atlantic 2.662 waiting at the departure side of the Gare du Nord station in Paris, with six coaches and a Prussian tender. Source: Collyns, Adrian H. Northern Steam Vapeurs du Nord. DeGolyer Library, Southern Methodist University, 2003. Physical Description: 1 photograph: black and white; 13 x 18 cm. File: ag1983_0266_24_01_09r_steam_sm_opt.jpg Rights: Please cite Southern Methodist University, Central University Libraries, DeGolyer Library when using this image file. A high-quality version of this file may be obtained for a fee by contacting degolyer@smu.edu. For more information, see: digitalcollections.smu.edu/u?/rwy,708 View Railroads: Photographs, Manuscripts, and Imprints digitalcollections.smu.edu/all/cul/rwy
